content:
Yes, there is a rank and job title within the United States Navy that is responsible for personnel administrative support and could be assigned to an IPAC at a Marine Corps Base. This rank and job title is Yeoman (YN).

Yeomen are enlisted personnel in the United States Navy who specialize in administrative support and clerical tasks. They are responsible for maintaining personnel records, preparing and processing paperwork, and providing customer service to personnel.

In addition to the Navy, Yeomen may also be assigned to support personnel administrative tasks at Marine Corps Bases, including verifying enlistment and service information. However, it's worth noting that the specific personnel assigned to an IPAC at a Marine Corps Base may vary depending on the needs of the unit and the qualifications of the personnel available.
